 2022-02942022-03-25,  ,  ,  NR, 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of MARGO GOODHAND of Victoria, British Columbia, as a special adviser to the Minister of National Revenue, to serve as a member of the Independent Advisory Board on Eligibility for Journalism Tax Measures, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years, on a part-time basis.
